00015 void cShip::update() {
00016         bob += bobvel * dtime * speed;
00017         bobvel -= 0.0001;
00018         if (bob < 0) {
00019                 bob = 0;
00020                 bobvel = 0;
00021         }
00022         if (respawning && (SDL_GetTicks() - respawnstart >= respawntime)) {
00023                 respawning = false;
00024         } 
00025 }

00027 void cShip::draw() {
00028         glPushMatrix();
00029                 glTranslatef(0, 0.5+0.07*sin((float)SDL_GetTicks()*bpm/(float)30000) + bob, -6);
00030                 if (respawning) {
00031                         glTranslatef(0.07*sin((float)SDL_GetTicks()*bpm/(float)3000) + bob, 0.3, 0);
00032                         glColor4f(1,1,1, 0.2);
00033                 } else {
00034                         glColor3fv(color[WHITE][0]);
00035                 }
00036                 glRotatef(-90,1,0,0);
00037                 glRotatef(90*bank, 0,1,0);
00038                 glScalef(0.15,0.10,0.15);
00039                 glGetFloatv(GL_MODELVIEW_MATRIX, modelviewmatrix);
00040                 model->Draw();
00041         glPopMatrix();
00042 }

00044 void cShip::bump() {
00045         bob = 0;
00046         bobvel = 0.0005;
